name: Robert Peterson & Fields Associates P.C.
memberOrga:
Cary L. Peterson, Managing Director and Principal
Cassandra Wilkerson, Administrative Director
goal: A law practice possessing attorneys, solicitors, and paralegals who specialize in international diplomacy and intergovernmental affairs between the Americas, Eastern Europe, and Asia-Pacific Region.
interests: Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, General and Institutional Affairs, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Trade
euInitiatives:
Our law firm works to enable non-governmental organizations and government agencies to broaden Trans-Atlantic affairs between Eastern Europe and the United States.

The intergovernmental affairs and international diplomacy between Member States and international organizations enables main EU initiatives and awareness on global peacemaking solutions that benefit civil society.
